errors.error_description: The file path 'path/to/ecoinvent/dataset/' provided in the example is likely incorrect, as the folder is typically named 'datasets' (plural), which will cause a FileNotFoundError.
correction_candidates: The path is a placeholder; it should be replaced with the actual path to the ecospold2 files.
Change 'path/to/ecoinvent/dataset/' to the full absolute path of the directory.
